browser-action.name: Close browser
browser-action.description:
Close the browser.
This action is useful for avoiding stacking browser instances on a single VU. The recommended configurations are : - If the OpenBrowser action is in the INIT container, put the CloseBrowser action in the END container. - If the OpenBrowser action is at the beginning of the ACTIONS container, put the CloseBrowser action at end of the ACTIONS container.
Possible parameters are: - ignoreErrors (optional): Set this option to true to ignore errors for this action. This is useful for handling conditional actions without having to resort to a "If...Then...Else" or a "Try...Catch" block. Default value is "false". - shouldCloseOnlyContext (optional): true or false to close only RealBrowser context and reuse previous browser for current VU. RealBrowser context is cheap to create/destroy. Default value is "false".
